class.name: StringArray
class.description: String Array. Array of strings. Can only contain strings. Optimized for memory usage, can't fragment the memory.

method.name: push_back
method.description: Append a string element at end of the array.

method.name: resize
method.description: Set the size of the [StringArray]. If larger than the current size it will reserve some space beforehand, and if it is smaller it will cut off the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Change the [String] at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Return the size of the array.
